describe.zh_CN: 精灵们依然使用羊皮卷进行存储信息，手里一堆没有地方装？制作一个元素手册吧，可以将身上多余的羊皮卷装入手册中，更好的储存与查阅。
describe.en_US: The Elves still use Parchment to store information, but what to do when you have a bunch and nowhere to put them? Make an Parchment Manual! You can store your extra Parchments in the manual for better storage and reference.
